titles.title: Taxpayer Information Protection and Privacy Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restrict the use of tax return information by preparers of returns.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/6/2006--Introduced. Taxpayer Information Protection and Privacy Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit tax return preparers from: (1) soliciting taxpayers for consent to the disclosure or use of their tax return information for any purpose; and (2) disclosing tax return information to tax preparers located outside the United States without taxpayer consent.
